title: Delays in LP gas distribution; Litro asks public not to stand in queues
body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka Limited says the two LP gas shipments, for which the payment was settled yesterday, could not be unloaded last evening.
The prevailing adverse weather conditions had hindered the unloading process, the company explained.
According, the general public is requested not to stand in queues as distribution is expected to experience delays.
